abstract: Attorney General Andrew M. Cuomo of New York has issued subpoenas to five board members of Bank of America as part of his continuing investigation into the bank’s hastily arranged takeover of Merrill Lynch.
snippet: Attorney General Andrew M. Cuomo of New York has issued subpoenas to five board members of Bank of America as part of his continuing investigation into the bank’s hastily arranged takeover of Merrill Lynch.
lead_paragraph: Update | 4:36 p.m. Attorney General Andrew M. Cuomo of New York has issued subpoenas to five board members of Bank of America as part of his continuing investigation into the bank’s hastily arranged takeover of Merrill Lynch, a person briefed on the inquiry told DealBook on Wednesday.

headline.main: Cuomo Subpoenas 5 Bank of America Directors
